title: Shopify E-Com
descr: A Headless NuxtJS E-Commerce site, with Shopify StorefrontAPI as the backend. The site is deployed on Vercel.

title: KreepMaster band Official website
descr: A relentless fusion of metallic mayhem and cybernetic chaos.

title: Music App Forum
descr: TuneThread is a music-sharing app, where unprofessional musicians can hear opinion on their creations and music consumers can discover new songs. Built with Vue(+Vue-Route, Pinia) and Firebase, deployed on Vercel.

title: Art and life
descr: A Template for an Art Magazine.
